articles.title: All the people from Devon on the New Year's Honours list - Devon Live
articles.description: People from sport, politics and education are on the list
articles.content:
Dozens of people from Devon have been recognised in the New Year's Honours list.
Among them is Exeter Chiefs director of rugby Rob Baxter, who led the Sandy Park club to their first ever European Ch… [+5233 chars]
